q1: Are Mexico a better team than the United States?
a1: They are closer in skills than you would think.
q3: Will Mexico eventually win a World Cup?
a3: Yes, they have the talent they just need the opportunity.
q4: Will Mexico return to World Cup again?
a4: They have a weak qualifying region, so they almost certainly will be in it again.
q5: Is Mexico the best footballteam of south america?
a5: No, various South American teams are better than Mexico. Also, Mexico are part of Central America not South America so are members of a different association.
